tool_description: This API takes a photo URL and returns a unique representation of the image called a perceptual hash. It also has a feature to compare the similarity of two images by calculating the Hamming distance between their hashes.
name: Perceptual Image Hash
title: Perceptual Image Hash

api_list.name: Hamming Distance
api_list.description: Get's the hamming distance between two images
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://perceptual-image-hash.p.rapidapi.com/hamming-distance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "perceptual-image-hash.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Hash
api_list.description: Generates a perceptual hash for the given image
